character.age: 250 years young, for a dwarf of his kind.
character.background: Orphaned at birth and left to fend for himself in the dark depths of a dwarven mines, Eryndor was forced to rely on his wits and cunning to survive. He spent many years honing his skills as a treasure hunter, eventually earning a reputation among his peers.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark brown, often tied back in a ponytail
